## FieldLabel class

Class for a non-editable, non-serializable text field.  Blockly.FieldLabel

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldLabel extends Field 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Field](./blockly.field.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.fieldlabel.editable.md) |  | boolean | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. This field should not. |
